## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Code is formatted with `gofmt` (`make fmt`)
- [ ] `go vet` passes (`make vet`)
- [ ] golangci-lint passes (if installed)
- [ ] No new warnings introduced

### Testing

- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Tests cover edge cases and error conditions
- [ ] Tests are deterministic (not flaky)
- [ ] Benchmarks added for performance-critical code (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] Code is well-commented
- [ ] Public APIs have godoc comments
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration guide provided (for breaking changes)

### Security

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and secure

### Review

- [ ] Self-reviewed the code
- [ ] Checked for common mistakes (see [CODE_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md](../CODE_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md))
- [ ] Requested review from appropriate team members
- [ ] Addressed all review comments
